edu.uw.cirg.truenth.oauth.model

Class TrueNTHOAuthConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scribe.model.OAuthConfig
      • edu.uw.cirg.truenth.oauth.model.TrueNTHOAuthConfig

  • public class TrueNTHOAuthConfig
extends org.scribe.model.OAuthConfig
    Extension of OAuthConfig to include OAuth providers' server configuration.

    This class was designed to use in multithreading environments, it is tread safe after creation. It is immutable and does not rely on locks.

    Since:
    Sep 21, 2015
    Author:
    Victor de Lima Soares

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrueNTHOAuthConfig

        public TrueNTHOAuthConfig(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String secret,
                          java.lang.String accessTokenEndpointURL,
                          java.lang.String baseAuthorizationURL,
                          java.lang.String baseURL,
                          java.lang.String resourceURL,
                          java.lang.String rolesURL,
                          java.lang.String callback,
                          org.scribe.model.SignatureType signatureType,
                          java.lang.String scope,
                          java.io.OutputStream stream)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        key - APP key, distributed by SS (application ID).
        secret - APP secret, distributed by SS.
        accessTokenEndpointURL - URL that receives the access tokens.
        baseAuthorizationURL - The redirection URL where users authenticate.
        baseURL - Shared Services' base URL.
        resourceURL - Shared Services' resource URL (protected API base).
        rolesURL - Shared Services' roles URL.
        callback - Point where to redirect users after receiving a code to request access tokens.
        signatureType - Type of signature, to be used when issuing requests.
        scope - Authorization scope.
        stream - Output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessTokenEndpoint

        public java.lang.String getAccessTokenEndpoint()
        Returns the URL that receives the access token requests.
        Returns:
        Request token URL.

      • getBaseAuthorizationURL

        public java.lang.String getBaseAuthorizationURL()
        Returns the redirection URL where users authenticate.

        This URL will be the base for building new authorization URLs, not being directly suitable for that use as encoding needs to be applied and parameters added.

        Returns:
        Base for authorization URLs.
        See Also:
        TrueNTHOAuthProvider.getAuthorizationUrl(TrueNTHOAuthConfig)

      • getBaseURL

        public java.lang.String getBaseURL()
        Returns the configured Shared Services base URL.

        This URL points to Shared Services base URL, it should not be used for OAuth operations, but for fetching static resources, such as CSS. It is mainly used for templates.

        Returns:
        Configured Shared Services base URL.

      • getResourceURL

        public java.lang.String getResourceURL()
        Returns the configured resource URL (API base).
        Returns:
        Resource URL.

      • getRolesURL

        public java.lang.String getRolesURL()
        Returns the configured roles URL.
        Returns:
        Roles URL.
